heading: # System bars
headingText: The `v-system-bar` component can be used for displaying statuses to the user. It looks like the Android system bar and can contain icons, spacers, and some text.

usage.desc: `v-system-bar` in its simplest form displays a small container with default theme.

color.heading: ### Colored bar
color.desc: You can optionally change the color of the `v-system-bar` by using the `color` prop.

window.heading: ### Window bar
window.desc: A window bar with window controls and status info.

themes.heading: ### Themes
themes.desc: Dark or light theme variants can be applied to `v-system-bar`.

lights-out.heading: ### Lights out
lights-out.desc: You can reduce `v-system-bar`'s opacity using `lights-out` property.

props.window: Increases the system bar height to 32px (24px default).
